description: This source file contains functions for managing network entities and ports via system events, including setting and retrieving entity member configurations, port paths, and port members in a network management context.

methods.name: int ep_set_entity_vid_portMembers(int vid,int entity,char * memberPortNames[],int numPorts)
methods.description: Sets the member ports for a given entity within a VLAN ID, updating system event storage with the list of ports.

methods.name: int ep_set_entity_vidMembers(int vid,int entities[],int numEntities)
methods.description: Sets VLAN entity memberships for a specific VLAN ID in system event storage.

methods.name: int ep_set_trunkPort_vid_paths(int vid,char * portName,PEntityPath paths,int numPaths)
methods.description: Stores trunk port path references associated with a VLAN ID and port name in system event storage.

methods.name: int ep_set_trunkPort_vidMembers(int vid,char * portNames[],int numPorts)
methods.description: Sets trunk port member list for a VLAN ID in system event storage.

methods.name: int ep_get_entity_vid_portMembers(int vid,int entity,char * memberPortNames[],int * numPorts,char buf[],int bufSize)
methods.description: Retrieves member port names for a specific entity and VLAN ID from system event storage.

methods.name: int ep_get_entity_vidMembers(int vid,int entities[],int * numEntities)
methods.description: Retrieves entity IDs associated with a VLAN ID from system event storage.

methods.name: int ep_get_trunkPort_vid_paths(int vid,char * portName,PEntityPath paths,int * numPaths)
methods.description: Fetches trunk port paths for a VLAN ID and port name from system event storage.

methods.name: int ep_get_trunkPort_vidMembers(int vid,char * portNames[],int * numPorts,char buf[],int bufSize)
methods.description: Retrieves trunk port member names for a VLAN ID from system event storage.
